leitej.net.dtp

Class DtpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.net.dtp.DtpServer

  • public final class DtpServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Transport Protocol (DTP)
    Server

    The constructor will put a call to close() in the ShutdownHookUtil.addToFirst(InvokeItf).

    Author:
    Julio Leite
